column1: Describe what specific programming features, online tools and applications you have developed for other clients?
column2:
Chronus mentoring software includes features offering:
 - Easy mentor-mentee matching with MatchIQ® Technology
 - Cost-efficient, streamlined program management
 - A comprehensive mobile experience, including iOS and Android apps, helping to drive program engagement

column1: Will you be using “off-the-shelf” software packages?
